text: Balia abalindanga mbu munyoole amasila, mana nimunyoola obushili burulanga wa Nyasaye baboola mbu; “shikhwabeele ninanyu.” Ne Abakhayi nibashilile 4. bababoolela mbu, “shikhwali halala ninanyu nikhubakhonyanga okhubekalila okhurulana nende Abasuubili.” Nyasaye alibusia hakari wenyu inyanga yeyindukho, ne Nyasaye shiyakhabahelesia Abakhayi injila yokhushila Abasuubili tawe
